Class Creature

extends java.lang.Object

      • getError

        public java.lang.String getError(java.lang.String e)
        Method for getting an error message. This method is called if there is an error from certain methods in Player.
        Parameters:
        e - String
        Returns:
        empty string if no errors, else it returns the correct error-message

      • goRoom

        public boolean goRoom(java.lang.String direction)
        Method used for travelling between rooms. This method takes a string containing the name of a Room, it then fetches the actual object using Room.getExit(java.lang.String). If it finds the object, the method [@link #setCurrentRoom(Room room)} is called and the method returns true. If the object is not found the method returns false.
        Parameters:
        direction - String
        Returns:
        true if currentRoom is changed, false if it is not
